DataList.LocalizeJP: はい！私にお任せください！
DataList.LocalizeEN: OK! Leave it to me!

DataList.LocalizeJP: 応援が必要なら、私の出番ですね！
DataList.LocalizeEN: If support is needed, then it's my turn!

DataList.LocalizeJP: フレー、フレー！…あ、まだでしたか？…あはは。
DataList.LocalizeEN: Hurray! Hurray! Ah, it's not time yet? Ahaha.

DataList.LocalizeJP: 応援が、足りなかったのでしょうか…。
DataList.LocalizeEN: My support is not good enough.

DataList.LocalizeJP: うう…。すみません、もっとお腹から声を出しますね。
DataList.LocalizeEN: I'm sorry. I should've cheered harder.<ref group=note>The Japanese literally means "I should have spoken from my stomach"</ref>

DataList.LocalizeJP: むむ！これは長期戦になりそうですね！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Mumu. Looks like this will be a prolonged battle.

DataList.LocalizeJP: むむ！これは応援が必要です！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Mumu. Looks like support is necessary.

DataList.LocalizeJP: ふう、素晴らしい試合でした！お疲れさまでした！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Phew. It was a great game. Nice work!

DataList.LocalizeJP: ふう、ふう…、何とか無事に終わってよかったです！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Phew... Thankfully it ended without incident.

DataList.LocalizeJP: これは…！お気遣いありがとうございます！
DataList.LocalizeEN: This... Thank you for your consideration!

DataList.LocalizeJP: どうやら説明が必要なようですね！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Looks like an explanation is necessary.

DataList.LocalizeJP: 無駄です！
DataList.LocalizeEN: It's useless!

DataList.LocalizeJP: え！私が最前列ですか？…応援するのに！？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Eh? I'm at the very front? Even though I'm supposed to cheer?

DataList.LocalizeJP: 先頭に立ちます！…うわ！これは違いますかね？
DataList.LocalizeEN: I'm going first! Oops. Did I get it wrong?

DataList.LocalizeJP: はい！次へ行きましょう！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Ok. Moving to the next location.

DataList.LocalizeJP: 休憩はまだ先みたいですね！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Looks like it's not time for rest yet.

DataList.LocalizeJP: ありがとうございます！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Thank you!

DataList.LocalizeJP: た、体力が…、限界です。
DataList.LocalizeEN: My strength is at its limit.

DataList.LocalizeJP: いけます！
応援の効果があったのでしょうか。
DataList.LocalizeEN: Was my support useful?

DataList.LocalizeJP: 皆さん、お疲れさまでした！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Thank you for your hard work, everyone!

DataList.LocalizeJP: あ、それはですね。…説明しましょう！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Ah. That. Let me explain.

DataList.LocalizeJP: こちらをご覧くださーい。いきますよー！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Please look here. Here I go!

DataList.LocalizeJP: フレー、フレー！今です！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Hurray! Hurray! Now is the time!

DataList.LocalizeJP: コトリの応援、行きます！はー！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Kotori's support. Here it goes! Haaaaa!

DataList.LocalizeJP: 華麗に参ります！
DataList.LocalizeEN: A gorgeous appearance!

DataList.LocalizeJP: す、少しやりすぎてしまいましたか！？
DataList.LocalizeEN: D, did it I over do it?

DataList.LocalizeJP: あー！なんですかこれ？…ごめんなさーい！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Ah! What is this? I'm sorry!

DataList.LocalizeJP: これも全部応援のため、皆さんのためですよね！
DataList.LocalizeEN: All this is for the sake giving support and helping everyone.

DataList.LocalizeJP: ありがとうございます、先生！目をかけていただいた分、努力します！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Thank you! Sensei! I will work hard!

DataList.LocalizeJP: 応援するのは私の方なのに。…なんだか照れますね！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Cheering is supposed to be my job, though... I'm somehow a little embarassed.

DataList.LocalizeJP: 私ばかり応援してもらってる気がします。…私も、いつかは先生のために！
DataList.LocalizeEN: I feel like I'm always the one receiving help. Someday, I will be able to help Sensei too!

DataList.LocalizeJP: 先生？その…、応援はいりませんか？あの！私で良ければ！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Sensei? Um... Do you need support? Um... If you're fine with me

DataList.LocalizeJP: いつだって準備はできています！必要な時はなんなりとおっしゃってください！
DataList.LocalizeEN: I'm ready whenever! Please let me know when you need me.

DataList.LocalizeJP: これで日頃のお礼になれば嬉しいですが。
チア衣装…あ、お好きなんですか？なら毎日着ますよ！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Cheer costume... Ah, do you like it? I'll wear it everyday then!
